header_text: When you call one of your siblings they seem upset but you don't know what's wrong. They give you a short answer when you try to talk with them about it. You consider why they're mad, and realize that it is not you.

elements.text: When you call one of your siblings they seem upset but you don't know what's wrong. They give you a short answer when you try to talk with them about it. You consider why they're mad, and realize that it is not you.
